reviewText: Dean Stockwell is wonderful in this film, one of his roles bridging from juvenile actor to young man. The story clearly reflects the thinking of the 1950's but the basic emotions it displays are timeless.

Not sure what is going on here , but after viewing 53 minutes of "The Careless Years",  it just switches to a completely different movie and never changes back.  I sent an email to amazon regarding this issue and see that nothing has been done about it.  Unfortunately, it looks like i may not get to find out how the story ends.

The movie would have a been a great one, but it was quite conflicting. The story line is about two young teenagers madly in love who considers marriage to avoid the pitfall of givng to sexual their passions. Their parents, obviously feel they are making a hasty decision. Did they get marry? What happened? I could not answer this because another movie which does not start from its beginning is integrated into the first movie which seemed to have been a good movie as well. Apparently, two movies were erroneously recorded as one . Initially, I had considered purchasing this movie, in fact it was in my cart; but when it was interrupted with another movie, and I did not get to see the ending, I was very disappointed. I really would have loved to see how this movie ended - how unfortunate. The version I watched was Amazon Instant Videso - Prime The Careless Years
